name: croissant
description: A croissant is a laminated, yeast-leavened bakery product that contains dough/roll-in fat layers to create a flaky, crispy texture.

name: burger
description: A burger is a patty of ground beef grilled and placed between two halves of a bun.

name: hotdog
description: A hot dog is a food consisting of a steamed sausage served in the slit of a partially sliced bun.
